description: A futuristic, gaming-inspired UI design system for displaying leaderboard data. The style is defined by a dark, immersive theme, custom container shapes, and vibrant neon glowing effects, primarily in shades of purple and blue.

primary.name: primary-background
primary.description: Deep purple, used for the main background.

secondary.name: container-background
secondary.description: Slightly lighter purple for the main content area inside the frame.

accent-glow.name: vibrant-purple-glow
accent-glow.description: A bright, glowing purple for outer borders and highlights.

accent-glow-secondary.name: bright-cyan-glow
accent-glow-secondary.description: A vivid cyan used for inner border glows and highlights.

text-primary.name: primary-text
text-primary.description: White for primary text, titles, and body content.

text-accent.name: accent-text-red
text-accent.description: A bright red for highlighting specific data like losses.

table-header.name: table-header-background
table-header.description: A distinct teal/cyan for the leaderboard's header background.

typography.fontFamily: Sans-Serif, preferably a clean, futuristic font like 'Exo 2' or 'Orbitron'

layout.mainContainer: A single, centered container with custom shape and significant padding.

main-frame.name: main-view-frame
main-frame.description: The primary outer container with a custom, non-rectangular shape and intricate multi-layered glowing borders.

header.name: leaderboard-header
header.description: The top section containing the title and subtitle.

header-decoration.name: corner-pixel-art
header-decoration.description: Decorative pixel art elements flanking the header.

leaderboard-table.name: leaderboard-grid
leaderboard-table.description: The main table for displaying ranked data.

user-icon.name: user-avatar-icon
user-icon.description: Small circular icon next to the user's name.

score-pill.name: data-pill
score-pill.description: A rounded, pill-shaped container for numerical scores.

button-group.name: action-button-container
button-group.description: Container for the action buttons at the bottom.

cta-button.name: primary-action-button
cta-button.description: A call-to-action button with a glowing, futuristic style.
